crucialShotMedal.name: crucialShotMedal
crucialShotMedal.condition: • Win the battle. • Newly received awards are added together. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
crucialShotMedal.description: In 20 battles, destroy the last enemy vehicle.

armorPiercer.name: armorPiercer
armorPiercer.condition: • A series is broken by a miss, non-penetration, or ricochet. The series can continue in the next battle using the same vehicle. • Every vehicle has its own series. Only the longest series is counted. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
armorPiercer.description: Score at least 5 armor-penetrating hits in a row against enemy vehicles.

ironShield.name: ironShield
ironShield.condition: • The targeted vehicles must be in a zone base. • The zone must not be captured in the moment the vehicle is damaged. • The targeted vehicles must be within 150 m of the main objectives. • The main objective still needs to be functional at the moment the vehicle is damaged. • Can be obtained in Frontline only.
ironShield.description: As a defender, cause 1,800 damage to vehicles in zone bases or within 150 m of the main objectives.

medalFadin.name: medalFadin
medalFadin.hero_info: A Hero of the Soviet Union, Alexander Fadin was a T-34 commander. Supported by one infantry platoon, Fadin managed to capture the village of Dashukovka (Ukraine) and hold it for five hours with one tank. He destroyed one tank, one SPG, eighteen machinegun nests, and neutralized up to 50 enemy soldiers and officers. His crew also shot down an enemy plane.
medalFadin.condition: • Awarded even if the enemy vehicle is destroyed by a fire caused by the last shell in the ammo. • Awarded for destroying the last enemy vehicle with the last shell using autoloading guns and machineguns. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalFadin.description: Destroy the last enemy vehicle in the battle with the last shell in the ammo.

medalCarius.name: medalCarius
medalCarius.hero_info: Otto Carius was one of the most successful tank aces of WWII. He commanded the Pz.Kpfw. 38(t), the Pz.Kpfw. VI Tiger, and the Jagdtiger tank destroyer during his impressive career.
medalCarius.description: For the number of enemy vehicles destroyed.

medalMonolith.name: medalMonolith
medalMonolith.condition: • SPG's speed must be less than 10 km/h. • The speed of the enemy vehicle that rammed you must exceed the speed of your SPG. • The player must not destroy any allied vehicles. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalMonolith.description: While driving an SPG, destroy an enemy vehicle by ramming and survive the battle.

medalEkins.name: medalEkins
medalEkins.hero_info: Joe Ekins was a tank gunner in the Northamptonshire Division of the British Territorial Army. A number of sources identify Ekins as the individual who brought down famous German tank ace Michael Wittmann.
medalEkins.description: For destroying Tier VIII–X enemy vehicles.

noMansLand.name: noMansLand
noMansLand.condition: • Awarded to all members of both teams. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
noMansLand.description: End a battle in a draw where both teams are completely destroyed.

heroesOfRassenay.name: heroesOfRassenay
heroesOfRassenay.hero_info: In June 1941, near the Lithuanian town of Raseiniai, roughly 20 KV tanks of the Soviet 3rd Mechanized Corps met the assault of the 6th Panzer Division, with approximately 100 vehicles. A single KV tank managed to hold off the German advance for a full day while being pummeled by a variety of antitank weapons, until finally the KV ran out of ammunition and was knocked out.
heroesOfRassenay.condition: • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
heroesOfRassenay.description: Destroy enemy vehicles: 14 and more — Standard Battle, Assault, Encounter. 21 and more — Grand Battle.

aimer.name: aimer
aimer.condition: • Win the battle. • The series is extended for every 1,000 HP of damage caused by allies to enemy vehicles spotted by you in one battle. • Every vehicle has its own series. • Only the longest series is counted. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
aimer.description: Spot enemy vehicles, enabling your allies to cause 1,000 HP of damage in one battle.

markIRepairer.name: markIRepairer
markIRepairer.description: Repair a track of the Mk. I.

readyForBattleLT.name: readyForBattleLT
readyForBattleLT.description: For completion with honors of personal missions for light tanks during the Long-Awaited Backup campaign.

defender.name: defender
defender.condition: • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
defender.description: Reduce the number of enemy capture points of a friendly base by 70 or more.

FE18OpenRegistration.name: FE18OpenRegistration
FE18OpenRegistration.condition: • Match result does not count. • Was awarded during the special football event.
FE18OpenRegistration.description: Play at least one match in the Gold Cup tournament.

FE18OpenFirstPlace.name: FE18OpenFirstPlace
FE18OpenFirstPlace.condition: • Was awarded during the special football event.
FE18OpenFirstPlace.description: Win the final match of the Gold Cup tournament.

effectiveSupport.name: effectiveSupport
effectiveSupport.condition: • Was awarded for causing at least 2,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles. • Could only be obtained in the Rampage mode.
effectiveSupport.description: Cause more damage to enemy vehicles with Combat Reserves than any other player in the battle.

medalLehvaslaiho.name: medalLehvaslaiho
medalLehvaslaiho.hero_info: Reino Lehväslaiho was a Finnish tank ace who destroyed seven tanks and tank destroyers.
medalLehvaslaiho.condition: • The enemy vehicles must be at least 1 tier higher. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalLehvaslaiho.description: Destroy 2 enemy tanks or tank destroyers with a medium tank in one battle.

smallArmy.name: smallArmy
smallArmy.condition: • Awarded to the platoon with the highest number of destroyed enemy vehicles. • If two or more platoons destroyed an equal number of enemy vehicles (at least 20), the award is granted to the platoon that earned the most XP. • Can be obtained in Frontline only.
smallArmy.description: Awarded to a platoon that destroyed at least 20 enemy vehicles in one battle.

tankExpert7.name: tankExpert7
tankExpert7.description: Destroy all vehicles from the Czechoslovakia Tech Tree except Premium and award vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, battles on the Global Map, and the Proving Ground mode (first 10 battles) are counted.

frontlineMedal.name: frontlineMedal
frontlineMedal.description: Achieve the highest Tier in the Frontline game mode.

victoryMarch.name: victoryMarch
victoryMarch.condition: • Victories in training are not counted. • Can be obtained in Ranked Team Battles only.
victoryMarch.description: Win 3 battles in a row as a member of the same team.

histBattle5_historyLessons.name: histBattle5_historyLessons
histBattle5_historyLessons.name_i18n: Lessons of History: Battle of Berlin
histBattle5_historyLessons.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
histBattle5_historyLessons.description: Win at least one battle on each of the belligerent sides in any vehicle.

NY18A1.name: NY18A1
NY18A1.condition: • You can enhance the Festive Atmosphere by putting more decorations on the objects in your Garage. • Awarded to all players who fulfilled the respective condition during the 2017–2018 New Year special.
NY18A1.description: Reach Festive Atmosphere Level II by participating in the New Year special.

NY18A3.name: NY18A3
NY18A3.condition: • You can enhance the Festive Atmosphere by putting more decorations on the objects in your Garage. • Awarded to all players who fulfilled the respective condition during the 2017–2018 New Year special.
NY18A3.description: Reach Festive Atmosphere Level X by participating in the New Year special.

NY18A2.name: NY18A2
NY18A2.condition: • You can enhance the Festive Atmosphere by putting more decorations on the objects in your Garage. • Awarded to all players who fulfilled the respective condition during the 2017–2018 New Year special.
NY18A2.description: Reach Festive Atmosphere Level V by participating in the New Year special.

tankExpert4.name: tankExpert4
tankExpert4.description: Destroy all vehicles from the France Tech Tree except Premium and award vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, battles on the Global Map, and the Proving Ground mode (first 10 battles) are counted.

sniper.name: sniper
sniper.condition: • Non-penetrating hits were included. • Direct hits on friendly vehicles were not allowed. • If two or more players had identical hit ratios, the achievement was awarded to the player with the highest number of hits. • If two or more players had identical hit ratios and the same number of hits, the achievement was awarded to the player who had earned more XP for the battle. • The achievement could only be awarded once per battle. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only. • Awarded before the release of 0.8.11 version.
sniper.description: Achieve at least 85% hits out of a minimum of 10 shots fired with potential damage of 1,000 HP or more.

titleSniper.name: titleSniper
titleSniper.condition: • The series is broken by a miss. • Every vehicle has its own series that continues to the next battle using the same vehicle. • Only the longest series is counted. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
titleSniper.description: Hit enemy vehicles with 10 or more consecutive shots.

secretOperations.name: secretOperations
secretOperations.condition: • All vehicles participating in the enemy base capture must survive the battle and earn base capture points. • Enemy must not reduce any capture points of their base. • Victories in training are not counted. • Can be obtained in Ranked Team Battles only.
secretOperations.description: Win the battle by capturing the enemy base with a group of at least 2 allied vehicles or with at least 1 vehicle of each team capturing both bases at the same time.

tacticalAdvantage.name: tacticalAdvantage
tacticalAdvantage.condition: • Win the battle. • Awarded to all members of the victorious team in a battle. • The vehicle lost in battle must not be higher than Tier VII. • Victories in training are not counted. • Can be obtained in Ranked Team Battles only.
tacticalAdvantage.description: Destroy all enemy vehicles while losing only one vehicle of the lowest tier on your team.

histBattle2_battlefield.name: histBattle2_battlefield
histBattle2_battlefield.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
histBattle2_battlefield.description: Win at least one battle on each of the belligerent sides in all vehicles that fought in the actual battle.

aloneInTheField.name: aloneInTheField
aloneInTheField.condition: • Only awarded to solo players. • Was awarded for causing at least 10,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles. • Damage caused with Combat Reserves was also counted. • Could only be obtained in a battle of Steel Hunt in the Rampage mode.
aloneInTheField.description: Cause more damage to enemy vehicles than any other player in the battle.

predator.name: predator
predator.condition: • Enemy vehicles destroyed by Combat Reserves were also counted. • Could only be obtained in a battle of Domination in the Rampage mode.

tankExpert9.name: tankExpert9
tankExpert9.description: Destroy all vehicles from the Polish Tech Tree except Premium and award vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Advances, battles on the Global Map, and the Proving Ground mode (first 10 battles) are counted.

EFC2016Goleador.name: EFC2016Goleador
EFC2016Goleador.condition: • Was awarded during the special football event. • Was unavailable in the football tournament.
EFC2016Goleador.description: Score at least 3 goals in one match.

markOfMastery.name: markOfMastery

options.description: Awarded for mastery in controlling an armored vehicle. To qualify, a player must earn more experience in a battle than the average highest experience of 50% players who have fought in this vehicle for the previous 7 days.

Awarded for mastery in controlling an armored vehicle. To qualify, a player must earn more experience in a battle than the average highest experience of 80% players who have fought in this vehicle for the previous 7 days.

Awarded for mastery in controlling an armored vehicle. To qualify, a player must earn more experience in a battle than the average highest experience of 95% players who have fought in this vehicle for the previous 7 days.

Awarded for mastery in controlling an armored vehicle. To qualify, a player must earn more experience in a battle than the average highest experience of 99% players who have fought in this vehicle for the previous 7 days.

markOfMastery.condition: • The statistics show the maximum rank of a mastery. • A newly received current rank is displayed in the window of the battle results. • Can be obtained in Random Battles and Ranked Battles.
markOfMastery.description: Awarded for mastery in controlling an armored vehicle. To qualify, a player must earn more experience in a battle than the average highest experience of 50% players who have fought in this vehicle for the previous 7 days.

markI100Years.name: markI100Years
markI100Years.description: Awarded for participation in the "Anniversary of First Tank Creation" event.

tankExpert2.name: tankExpert2
tankExpert2.description: Destroy all vehicles from the U.S.A. Tech Tree except Premium and award vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, battles on the Global Map, and the Proving Ground mode (first 10 battles) are counted.

geniusForWarMedal.name: geniusForWarMedal
geniusForWarMedal.condition: • Only victorious battles are counted. • Newly received awards are added together. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
geniusForWarMedal.description: In 100 battles, be the top player by experience earned.

crusher.name: crusher
crusher.condition: • The level of the defending team's Command Center must not be lower than the level of the attacking team's Command Center. • Personal achievement. • Awarded before the release of version 9.17.1.
crusher.description: Capture the enemy Command Center while attacking their Stronghold.

occupyingForce.name: occupyingForce
occupyingForce.condition: • Earn 100 base capture points. • Destroy an enemy main objective. • Can be obtained in Frontline only.
occupyingForce.description: As an attacker, earn a total of 100 base capture points or destroy an enemy main objective.

tankExpert6.name: tankExpert6
tankExpert6.description: Destroy all vehicles from the Japan Tech Tree except Premium and award vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, battles on the Global Map, and the Proving Ground mode (first 10 battles) are counted.

tankExpert5.name: tankExpert5
tankExpert5.description: Destroy all vehicles from the U.K. Tech Tree except Premium and award vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, battles on the Global Map, and the Proving Ground mode (first 10 battles) are counted.

medalLavrinenko.name: medalLavrinenko
medalLavrinenko.hero_info: Dmitry Lavrinenko, a Hero of the Soviet Union, Guards Lieutenant, and tank ace, was recognized as the top Soviet tanker, destroying 52 tanks in 28 battles over the course of just two months.
medalLavrinenko.condition: • Up to 100 points per battle are included.
medalLavrinenko.description: Reduce the total number of capture points of a friendly base.

supremeGun.name: supremeGun
supremeGun.condition: • Do not hit any allies by direct shot. • Caused damage, assisted damage through allies and damage caused with combat reserves is counted. • If two or more players cause an equal amount of damage, the award is granted to the player who earned the most XP. • Can be obtained in Frontline only.
supremeGun.description: Awarded to players who caused and assisted the highest amount of damage during a battle (at least 10,000).

arsonist.name: arsonist
arsonist.condition: • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
arsonist.description: Destroy at least one enemy vehicle by setting it on fire.

medalKolobanov.name: medalKolobanov
medalKolobanov.hero_info: Colonel Zinoviy Kolobanov was a Soviet tank ace who destroyed 22 German tanks, two guns, and two armored vehicles with his KV-1 in battle on August 19th, 1941.
medalKolobanov.condition: • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalKolobanov.description: Stand alone against at least five enemy vehicles and win.

tankExpert3.name: tankExpert3
tankExpert3.description: Destroy all vehicles from the China Tech Tree except Premium and award vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, battles on the Global Map, and the Proving Ground mode (first 10 battles) are counted.

medalLafayettePool.name: medalLafayettePool
medalLafayettePool.hero_info: Lafayette G. Pool is widely recognized as the U.S. tank ace of aces who destroyed a total of 258 armored vehicles and military vehicles.
medalLafayettePool.condition: • In vehicles of at least Tier V. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalLafayettePool.description: Destroy enemy vehicles: 10-13 — Standard Battle, Assault, Encounter. 13-20 — Grand Battle.

rangerMedal.name: rangerMedal
rangerMedal.condition: • Newly received awards are added together. • Only hits that cause damage are counted. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
rangerMedal.description: Damage or destroy enemy vehicles not visible to the player, 10 times.

pyromaniacMedal.name: pyromaniacMedal
pyromaniacMedal.condition: • Newly received awards are added together. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.

_x0030_1YearsOfService.name: 01YearsOfService
_x0030_1YearsOfService.condition: Awarded to players for their invaluable contribution to the evolution of World of Tanks.
_x0030_1YearsOfService.description: You have been in the game since %(regDate)s

histBattle4_battlefield.name: histBattle4_battlefield
histBattle4_battlefield.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
histBattle4_battlefield.description: Win at least one battle on each of the belligerent sides in all vehicles that fought in the actual battle.

strategicOperations.name: strategicOperations
strategicOperations.condition: • Victories in training are not counted. • Displayed in team achievements only. • Can be obtained in Ranked Team Battles only.
strategicOperations.description: For the number of victories on a Permanent Team.

histBattle6_battlefield.name: histBattle6_battlefield
histBattle6_battlefield.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
histBattle6_battlefield.description: Win at least one battle on each of the belligerent sides in all vehicles that fought in the actual battle.

medalKnispel.name: medalKnispel
medalKnispel.hero_info: Kurt Knispel, a WWII German tank ace, participated in battles on both the Western and Eastern Fronts, fighting in Pz.Kpfw. II, Pz.Kpfw. III, Pz.Kpfw. IV, Pz.Kpfw. VI Tiger, and Pz.Kpfw. VI Ausf. B Tiger II.
medalKnispel.description: For the total amount of damage caused and received.

bannerman.name: bannerman
bannerman.condition: • Only awarded to members of a Platoon. • Personal contribution was counted. • Could only be obtained in a battle of Steel Hunt in the Rampage mode.

shootToKill.name: shootToKill
shootToKill.condition: • Damage caused by ramming or setting enemy vehicle on fire is included. • Unavailable for SPGs. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
shootToKill.description: Cause more damage to enemy vehicles than the hit points of your vehicle.

invader.name: invader
invader.condition: • The achievement is awarded upon successful base capture, and only includes the points that were part of the base capture. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
invader.description: Earn at least 80 capture points on the enemy base.

bonecrusher.name: bonecrusher
bonecrusher.condition: • Modules damaged by fire are counted. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
bonecrusher.description: Damage enemy vehicles' modules or injure crew members at least five times in a battle.

fireAndSteelMedal.name: fireAndSteelMedal
fireAndSteelMedal.condition: • Survive a battle. • Newly received awards are added together. • Only victorious battles are counted. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
fireAndSteelMedal.description: Receive maximum total amount of damage taken and damage blocked by armor 25 times.

mechanicEngineer.name: mechanicEngineer
mechanicEngineer.description: Research all vehicles in all Tech Trees.

histBattle2_historyLessons.name: histBattle2_historyLessons
histBattle2_historyLessons.name_i18n: Lessons of History: Battle of Kursk
histBattle2_historyLessons.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
histBattle2_historyLessons.description: Win at least one battle on each of the belligerent sides in any vehicle.

kampfer.name: kampfer
kampfer.condition: • Personal achievement. • Awarded before the release of version 9.17.1.
kampfer.description: For the number of victories in Battles for Stronghold.

medalKay.name: medalKay
medalKay.hero_info: Douglas Kay, a British Army sergeant and gunner on a Sherman Firefly, participated in the Allied landing in Normandy and later helped increase popular interest in tank warfare.

duelist.name: duelist
duelist.condition: • Damage to modules is included. • Ricochets and non-penetrating hits are not included. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
duelist.description: Destroy at least 2 enemy vehicles that caused damage to your vehicle in the battle.

markIProtector.name: markIProtector
markIProtector.condition: • Awarded to all members of the victorious team during the special event. • Only one award for all battles fought can be received.
markIProtector.description: Win a battle during the Convoy event by helping the Mk. I successfully capture the enemy base.

kingOfTheHill.name: kingOfTheHill
kingOfTheHill.condition: • Win the battle. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
kingOfTheHill.description: Be the only survivor while driving a tank or a tank destroyer.

_x0031_0YearsOfService.name: 10YearsOfService
_x0031_0YearsOfService.condition: Awarded to players for their invaluable contribution to the evolution of World of Tanks.
_x0031_0YearsOfService.description: You have been in the game since %(regDate)s

FE18OpenPlayOff.name: FE18OpenPlayOff
FE18OpenPlayOff.condition: • Was awarded during the special football event.
FE18OpenPlayOff.description: Reach the play-off stage of the Gold Cup tournament.

medalOrlik.name: medalOrlik
medalOrlik.hero_info: Roman Edmund Orlik, a Polish Army sergeant, was a tank ace who knocked out 13 German tanks with his light TKS tankette in September 1939.
medalOrlik.condition: • The enemy vehicles must be at least 1 tier higher. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalOrlik.description: Destroy 2 or more enemy tanks or tank destroyers in a light tank in one battle.

histBattle1_battlefield.name: histBattle1_battlefield
histBattle1_battlefield.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
histBattle1_battlefield.description: Win at least one battle on each of the belligerent sides in all vehicles that fought in the actual battle.

medalBrothersInArms.name: medalBrothersInArms
medalBrothersInArms.condition: • All Platoon members must survive the battle. • All Platoon members receive the award. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalBrothersInArms.description: Each Platoon member must destroy at least 3 enemy vehicles.

medalAbrams.name: medalAbrams
medalAbrams.hero_info: General Creighton Abrams commanded U.S. armored forces during WWII and the Vietnam War, earning a reputation as an aggressive and successful commander.
medalAbrams.description: For the total number of team victories in which the player survived the battle.

twitchPrime.name: twitchPrime
twitchPrime.description: Issued to players during special package drops.

medalRotmistrov.name: medalRotmistrov
medalRotmistrov.hero_info: Pavel Rotmistrov, a Hero of the Soviet Union, was a commander of armored units during World War II. Later he became the Chief Marshal of Armored Forces of the Soviet Union.
medalRotmistrov.description: For the number of battles fought in Clan Wars.

testartilleryman.name: testartilleryman
testartilleryman.condition: • Awarded during the 2015 April Fools event.
testartilleryman.description: Complete a special mission and receive a secret weapon.

streamersEventAmway921.name: streamersEventAmway921
streamersEventAmway921.condition: • Выдаётся игрокам, выполнившим необходимое условие в рамках события «Битва блогеров».
streamersEventAmway921.description: Вступить в команду блогера Amway921 и заработать 5 очков для его команды.

supporter.name: supporter
supporter.condition: • Targets that were destroyed by other players or lost in battle are included. • Ricochets and non-penetrating hits are not included. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
supporter.description: Cause damage or critical hits to more enemy vehicles, at least 6, than any other player.

markIBaseProtector.name: markIBaseProtector
markIBaseProtector.condition: • Awarded to all members of the victorious team during the special event. • Only one award for all battles fought can be received.
markIBaseProtector.description: Win a battle during the Convoy event by keeping the friendly base secure.

tankwomen.name: tankwomen
tankwomen.description: Recruit five female crew members. • Female crew members received for completing Personal Missions are counted.

luckyDevil.name: luckyDevil
luckyDevil.condition: • Also awarded if you are less than 10 meters away from an enemy vehicle at the moment of its destruction by an artillery strike or airstrike called in by another enemy team player in the Strongholds: Battles mode. • Can be obtained in Random Battles, Skirmishes, and Advances only.
luckyDevil.description: Witness an enemy vehicle being hit and destroyed by another enemy team player. You must be 10 meters or closer from the enemy vehicle at the moment of its destruction.

mainGun.name: mainGun
mainGun.condition: • Damage caused must be at least 20% of the total HP of enemy vehicles. • Damage caused must be at least 1,000 HP. • The player must not hit any allies by direct shots. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
mainGun.description: Cause the highest damage in a battle.

ironMan.name: ironMan
ironMan.condition: • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
ironMan.description: Survive at least 10 ricochets and non-penetrating hits in a row from enemy team players.

betaTester.name: betaTester
betaTester.name_i18n: For participation in the Beta test
betaTester.condition: Awarded to players for their invaluable contribution to the evolution of World of Tanks.

warrior.name: warrior
warrior.condition: • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
warrior.description: Destroy enemy vehicles: 6 and more — Standard Battle, Assault, Encounter. 8 and more — Grand Battle.

tankExpert0.name: tankExpert0
tankExpert0.description: Destroy all vehicles from the U.S.S.R. Tech Tree except Premium and award vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, battles on the Global Map, and the Proving Ground mode (first 10 battles) are counted.

marksOnGun.name: marksOnGun

options.description: To obtain two Marks of Excellence, displayed on the gun, the average damage caused by the player and average damage caused with the player's assistance must be higher than the results of 85% of players in this vehicle for the past 14 days.

To obtain three Marks of Excellence, displayed on the gun, the average damage caused by the player and average damage caused with the player's assistance must be higher than the results of 95% of players in this vehicle for the past 14 days.
The maximum number of Marks of Excellence is obtained.

marksOnGun.condition: • Player's average damage is updated after each battle. Only the 100 recent battles are counted. • Obtained Marks do not disappear even if the player's average damage decreases. • Marks can be obtained in vehicles of Tiers V–X only. • Display of Marks on your vehicles can be disabled in game settings. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
marksOnGun.description: To obtain one Mark of Excellence, displayed on the gun, the average damage caused by the player and average damage caused with the player's assistance must be higher than the results of 65% of players in this vehicle for the past 14 days.

falloutPackOfWolfs.name: falloutPackOfWolfs
falloutPackOfWolfs.condition: • Was awarded to victorious players who were playing as part of a Platoon in a battle during the special event. • Only one award for all battles fought could be received.
falloutPackOfWolfs.description: Win a battle of Steel Hunt.

rankedBattlesSeasonOne.name: rankedBattlesSeasonOne
rankedBattlesSeasonOne.condition: • Awarded at the end of Ranked Battles, Season 1.
rankedBattlesSeasonOne.description: Win 10 battles in Ranked Battles, Season 1.

medalWittmann.name: medalWittmann
medalWittmann.hero_info: Johannes Bölter was one of the most successful German tank aces of WWII. He participated in operations in the invasions of Poland, France, Greece, and the Soviet Union, as well as in the defense of France.
medalWittmann.condition: • The targets had to be enemy vehicles of Tiers IV-X. • Awarded before the release of version 0.8.0.
medalWittmann.description: Destroy 7 or more enemy vehicles with a tank or tank destroyer, or 10 or more vehicles with a self-propelled gun.

even.name: even
even.condition: • Enemy vehicles destroyed by setting them on fire or by ramming are counted. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
even.description: Simultaneously destroy, and be destroyed, by the same enemy.

deathTrack.name: deathTrack
deathTrack.condition: • Only the maximum series of victories in a row was counted. • A series was broken by a defeat. • Awarded to all members of a victorious team during the special race event.
deathTrack.description: Win a race with the Chaffee SPORT.

mechanicEngineer10.name: mechanicEngineer10
mechanicEngineer10.condition: • Unresearched modules do not prevent a player from receiving the award.
mechanicEngineer10.description: Research all vehicles in the Italian Tech Tree.

godOfWar.name: godOfWar
godOfWar.condition: • Newly received awards are added together. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
godOfWar.description: While driving an SPG, be the last survivor and win the battle.

counterblow.name: counterblow
counterblow.condition: • The level of the attacking team's Command Center must not be lower than the level of the defending team's Command Center. • Personal achievement. • Awarded before the release of version 9.17.1.
counterblow.description: Capture the enemy Command Center while defending your Stronghold.

conqueror.name: conqueror
conqueror.condition: • Only a player's personal contribution is counted. • Awarded before the release of version 9.17.1.
conqueror.description: For the total amount of Industrial Resource earned in Skirmishes.

medalRadleyWalters.name: medalRadleyWalters
medalRadleyWalters.hero_info: Sydney Valpy Radley-Walters was a Canadian tank ace of the 27th Armored Regiment. In 1944–1945 he destroyed 18 German vehicles with his Sherman Firefly.
medalRadleyWalters.condition: • In vehicles of at least Tier V. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalRadleyWalters.description: Destroy enemy vehicles: 8-9 — Standard Battle, Assault, Encounter. 10-12 — Grand Battle.

readyForBattleMT.name: readyForBattleMT
readyForBattleMT.description: For completion with honors of personal missions for medium tanks during the Long-Awaited Backup campaign.

FE18Collection3.name: FE18Collection3
FE18Collection3.condition: • Was awarded during the special football event.

FE18Collection2.name: FE18Collection2
FE18Collection2.condition: • Was awarded during the special football event.

FE18Collection1.name: FE18Collection1
FE18Collection1.condition: • Was awarded during the special football event.

HE17A3.name: HE17A3
HE17A3.condition: Complete all missions in the Halloween 2017 event.
HE17A3.description: You completed all missions in the Halloween 2017 event.

medalBillotte.name: medalBillotte
medalBillotte.hero_info: Pierre Billotte was a captain in the French Army who destroyed 2 Pz.Kpfw. IV, 11 Pz.Kpfw. III and two guns with his Char B1 bis on May 16th, 1940.
medalBillotte.condition: • Survive and win the battle. • Destroyed enemy vehicles count after all damage is received. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalBillotte.description: Destroy at least 2 enemy vehicles while having 5 different modules damaged or crew members injured and losing 80% of hit points.

impenetrable.name: impenetrable
impenetrable.condition: • Survive the battle. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
impenetrable.description: Have total damage blocked by armor exceed the hit points of your vehicle.

fallenFlags.name: fallenFlags
fallenFlags.condition: • Only awarded to solo players. • Destroy at least 4 flags. • Could only be obtained in a battle of Steel Hunt in the Rampage mode.
fallenFlags.description: Destroy more flags than Platoons deliver in a battle.

readyForBattleAllianceUSSR.name: readyForBattleAllianceUSSR
readyForBattleAllianceUSSR.description: For completion with honors of personal missions for Union during the Second Front campaign.

histBattle5_battlefield.name: histBattle5_battlefield
histBattle5_battlefield.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
histBattle5_battlefield.description: Win at least one battle on each of the belligerent sides in all vehicles that fought in the actual battle.

falloutSingleWolf.name: falloutSingleWolf
falloutSingleWolf.condition: • Was awarded to victorious solo players during the special event. • Only one award for all battles fought could be received.
falloutSingleWolf.description: Win a battle of Steel Hunt.

diehard.name: diehard
diehard.condition: • An unbroken series continues in the next battle using the same vehicle. • Every vehicle has its own series. Only the longest series is counted. • Battles fought in SPGs do not count. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
diehard.description: Survive 20 battles in a row using the same vehicle.

tacticalSkill.name: tacticalSkill
tacticalSkill.condition: • Awarded to all members of the victorious team in a battle. • Victories in training are not counted. • Can be obtained in Ranked Team Battles only.
tacticalSkill.description: Win the battle by destroying all enemy vehicles while not losing any allied vehicles.

histBattle4_historyLessons.name: histBattle4_historyLessons
histBattle4_historyLessons.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
histBattle4_historyLessons.description: Win at least one battle on each of the belligerent sides in any vehicle.

evileye.name: evileye
evileye.condition: • The player must be the only one spotting the enemy vehicles at the moment when they are damaged. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
evileye.description: Help your team damage at least 6 enemy vehicles by spotting them.

rankedBattlesHero.name: rankedBattlesHero
rankedBattlesHero.condition: • Awarded at the end of each season of Ranked Battles.
rankedBattlesHero.description: Achieve the highest rank in Ranked Battles mode.

tankExpert.name: tankExpert
tankExpert.description: Destroy all vehicles from each nation's Tech Trees except Premium and award vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, battles on the Global Map, and the Proving Ground mode (first 10 battles) are counted.

medalGore.name: medalGore
medalGore.hero_info: British colonel Adrian Clements Gore was in charge of a combat team that defended the Kasserine Pass, Tunisia, on 20 February, 1943. His force, composed of a tank squadron, an infantry company, and a battery of infantry support artillery, put up stiff resistance against troops of the Wehrmacht Africa Korps, comprising five infantry batallions and one tank batallion. The German forces lost 11 tanks in the fighting.
medalGore.condition: • Damage caused should be at least 2,000 HP • The player must not destroy any allied vehicles. • Hits on allied vehicles are not counted. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalGore.description: Drive an SPG and cause damage exceeding 8 times the hit points of your vehicle.

medalHalonen.name: medalHalonen
medalHalonen.hero_info: Erkki Halonen, a sergeant in the Finnish Army and a tank ace, destroyed three T-34, two KV-1, and two ISU-152 with his StuG III in battles during June and July 1944.
medalHalonen.condition: • The targets must be at least two tiers higher than the player's tank destroyer. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalHalonen.description: Destroy at least 2 enemy tanks or tank destroyers in a tank destroyer in one battle.

medalPascucci.name: medalPascucci
medalPascucci.hero_info: Second Lieutenant Luigi Arbib Pascucci was an Italian tank commander during World War Two. He fought with the Ariete Tank Division in North Africa. Pascucci fought in the Second Battle of El Alamein, where he sacrificed his life in a reckless frontal attack that enabled the rest of his company to escape encirclement.
medalPascucci.condition: • Drive a tank or a tank destroyer. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalPascucci.description: Destroy 2 enemy SPGs in one battle.

_x0030_5YearsOfService.name: 05YearsOfService
_x0030_5YearsOfService.condition: Awarded to players for their invaluable contribution to the evolution of World of Tanks.
_x0030_5YearsOfService.description: You have been in the game since %(regDate)s

fightingReconnaissanceMedal.name: fightingReconnaissanceMedal
fightingReconnaissanceMedal.condition: • Win the battle. • Spot at least 2 enemy vehicles. • Be among the top three damage dealers. • Newly received awards are added together. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
fightingReconnaissanceMedal.description: In 50 battles, fulfill the following conditions:

fallout2.name: fallout2
fallout2.condition: • Was awarded to all members of a victorious team during the special event. • Only one award for all battles fought could be received.
fallout2.description: Win a battle of Domination: Supply Swarm.

streamersEventLeBwA.name: streamersEventLeBwA
streamersEventLeBwA.condition: • Выдаётся игрокам, выполнившим необходимое условие в рамках события «Битва блогеров».
streamersEventLeBwA.description: Вступить в команду блогера LeBwa и заработать 5 очков для его команды.

_x0030_9YearsOfService.name: 09YearsOfService
_x0030_9YearsOfService.condition: Awarded to players for their invaluable contribution to the evolution of World of Tanks.
_x0030_9YearsOfService.description: You have been in the game since %(regDate)s

forTacticalOperations.name: forTacticalOperations
forTacticalOperations.condition: • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
forTacticalOperations.description: Awarded to the player for a certain number of victories on randomly selected teams.

tankExpert10.name: tankExpert10
tankExpert10.description: Destroy all vehicles from the Italian Tech Tree except Premium and award vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, battles on the Global Map, and the Proving Ground mode (first 10 battles) are counted.

firstMerit.name: firstMerit
firstMerit.description: Complete any mission in any set of the selected operation.

histBattle1_historyLessons.name: histBattle1_historyLessons
histBattle1_historyLessons.name_i18n: Lessons of History: Operation Spring Awakening
histBattle1_historyLessons.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
histBattle1_historyLessons.description: Win at least one battle on each of the belligerent sides in any vehicle.

readyForBattleHT.name: readyForBattleHT
readyForBattleHT.description: For completion with honors of personal missions for heavy tanks during the Long-Awaited Backup campaign.

falloutSteelHunter.name: falloutSteelHunter
falloutSteelHunter.condition: • Was awarded to all players who finished a battle of Steel Hunt during the special event. • Only one award for all battles fought could be received.
falloutSteelHunter.description: Fight a battle of Steel Hunt.

steelwall.name: steelwall
steelwall.condition: • Survive the battle. • Receive at least 11 hits. • The amount of damage received and damage blocked by armor must be at least 1,000 HP. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
steelwall.description: Receive the highest damage blocked by armor.

EFC2016.name: EFC2016
EFC2016.condition: • Only the longest series of victories in a row was counted. • A series was broken by a defeat. • Was awarded to all members of a victorious team during the special football event. • Was unavailable in the football tournament.
EFC2016.description: Win a football match in the T-62A SPORT.

xmasTreeGold.name: xmasTreeGold
xmasTreeGold.condition: • You can enhance the Festive Atmosphere by putting more decorations on your New Year Tree and Snowitzer. • Awarded to all players, who fulfill all required conditions during the 2016–2017 New Year special.
xmasTreeGold.description: Reach Festive Atmosphere Level X by participating in the New Year special.

FE18SoloStriker.name: FE18SoloStriker
FE18SoloStriker.description: Rank any position in the rating table of strikers during one stage of the football event.

rankedBattlesPioneer.name: rankedBattlesPioneer
rankedBattlesPioneer.condition: • Points are earned when a rank is received. • The total number of points for all stages is counted. • Awarded to all players who earned at least 4 points during the Ranked Battles Beta Season. • Awarded at the end of the season.
rankedBattlesPioneer.description: Earn at least 4 points during the season.

medalPoppel.name: medalPoppel
medalPoppel.hero_info: Lieutenant General of Tank Forces Nikolay Popel, a Soviet military leader and political officer, organized a raid against the enemy rear using captured vehicles during the battle of Dubno (Ukraine) in the summer of 1941.
medalPoppel.description: For the number of enemy vehicles detected.

_x0030_3YearsOfService.name: 03YearsOfService
_x0030_3YearsOfService.condition: Awarded to players for their invaluable contribution to the evolution of World of Tanks.
_x0030_3YearsOfService.description: You have been in the game since %(regDate)s

mechanicEngineer6.name: mechanicEngineer6
mechanicEngineer6.condition: • Unresearched modules do not prevent a player from receiving the award.
mechanicEngineer6.description: Research all vehicles in the Japan Tech Tree.

mechanicEngineer7.name: mechanicEngineer7
mechanicEngineer7.condition: • Unresearched modules do not prevent a player from receiving the award.
mechanicEngineer7.description: Research all vehicles in the Czechoslovakia Tech Tree.

mechanicEngineer4.name: mechanicEngineer4
mechanicEngineer4.condition: • Unresearched modules do not prevent a player from receiving the award.
mechanicEngineer4.description: Research all vehicles in the France Tech Tree.

mechanicEngineer5.name: mechanicEngineer5
mechanicEngineer5.condition: • Unresearched modules do not prevent a player from receiving the award.
mechanicEngineer5.description: Research all vehicles in the U.K. Tech Tree.

mechanicEngineer2.name: mechanicEngineer2
mechanicEngineer2.condition: • Unresearched modules do not prevent a player from receiving the award.
mechanicEngineer2.description: Research all vehicles in the U.S.A. Tech Tree.

fireAndSword.name: fireAndSword
fireAndSword.condition: • Industrial Resource lost as a result of defeat does not reduce the score. • Personal achievement. • Awarded before the release of version 9.17.1.
fireAndSword.description: For the total amount of Industrial Resource earned in all Battles for Stronghold.

mechanicEngineer0.name: mechanicEngineer0
mechanicEngineer0.condition: • Unresearched modules do not prevent a player from receiving the award.
mechanicEngineer0.description: Research all vehicles in the U.S.S.R. Tech Tree.

mechanicEngineer1.name: mechanicEngineer1
mechanicEngineer1.condition: • Unresearched modules do not prevent a player from receiving the award.
mechanicEngineer1.description: Research all vehicles in the Germany Tech Tree.

medalKursk.name: medalKursk
medalKursk.name_i18n: Hero of the Battle of Kursk
medalKursk.condition: • Awarded to all players who fulfilled the respective conditions during the event.
medalKursk.description: Complete 5 missions during the Battle of Kursk event.

unreachable.name: unreachable
unreachable.condition: • Could only be obtained in a battle of Domination in the Rampage mode.
unreachable.description: Earn more victory points than any other player in the battle.

whiteTiger.name: whiteTiger
whiteTiger.description: Destroy a White Tiger phantom tank.

medalTarczay.name: medalTarczay
medalTarczay.hero_info: Ervin Tarczay was a Hungarian tank ace. He fought with the Hungarian 2nd Armored Division and destroyed at least ten enemy vehicles.
medalTarczay.condition: • Survive and win the battle. • Destroyed enemy vehicles count after all damage is received. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalTarczay.description: Destroy at least 5 enemy vehicles while having 5 different modules damaged or crew members injured and losing 80% of hit points.

sinai.name: sinai
sinai.condition:
• IS, ISM, IS-2, IS-3, IS-3A, IS-4, IS-5, IS-6, IS-7, Kirovets-1, T-10
• ISU-122S, ISU-130, ISU-152
• Object 252U, Defender, Object 260, Object 261, Object 257, Object 263, Object 268, Object 268 Version 4, Object 704
• Only Soviet vehicles are included. • Series achieved in all vehicles are added together. • Newly received awards are added together. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Ranked Battles, Advances, and in battles on the Global Map are counted.
sinai.description: Destroy at least 100 tanks of the IS series and vehicles based on their chassis, including:

mechanicEngineer8.name: mechanicEngineer8
mechanicEngineer8.condition: • Unresearched modules do not prevent a player from receiving the award.
mechanicEngineer8.description: Research all vehicles in the Sweden Tech Tree.

mechanicEngineer9.name: mechanicEngineer9
mechanicEngineer9.condition: • Unresearched modules do not prevent a player from receiving the award.
mechanicEngineer9.description: Research all vehicles in the Poland Tech Tree.

infiltratorMedal.name: infiltratorMedal
infiltratorMedal.condition: • Achievement only includes the base capture points that resulted in a successful base capture. • Newly received awards are added together. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
infiltratorMedal.description: Earn at least 1,000 capture points on the enemy base.

guardsman.name: guardsman
guardsman.condition: • For example, when fighting for a team consisting of T-34 and BT-7 vehicles, it is required to drive a BT-7 tank. • Specific vehicles can be used as support vehicles in certain Historical Battles. • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
guardsman.description: For the number of victories that were won while driving support vehicles.

champion.name: champion
champion.condition: • Only awarded to solo players. • Destroy at least 3 flags. • Destroy at least 5 enemy vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed by Combat Reserves were also counted. • Could only be obtained in a battle of Steel Hunt in the Rampage mode.
champion.description: Cause at least 10,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles.

medalStark.name: medalStark
medalStark.hero_info: Colonel Alexander Stark commanded the joint French-American task force defending the Kasserine Pass, Tunisia. On 19 February, 1943, Stark's force unleashed heavy artillery fire from the heights surrounding the pass and was able to delay the advancing tank batallion and two infantry batallions of the Wehrmacht Africa Korps, forcing them to request reinforcements.
medalStark.condition: • Survive a battle. • Total amount of damage received and damage blocked by armor must be at least 2/3 of the hit points of your vehicle. • Hitting allied vehicles is not counted. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalStark.description: While driving an SPG, destroy at least 2 enemy vehicles and receive at least 2 enemy hits that cause damage or are blocked by armor.

medalDeLanglade.name: medalDeLanglade
medalDeLanglade.hero_info: Paul Girot de Langlade was a French Army lieutenant-colonel during WWII. In September 1943 he was promoted to colonel. De Langlade fought with the 2nd Tank Division under General Leclerc. On September 12-13, 1944, a combat team under de Langlade's command wiped out Panzerbrigade 112 in the battle of Dompaire, France. Only 4 out of 45 Panthers survived the battle.
medalDeLanglade.condition: • Enemy vehicles must be within the base circle. • Enemy vehicles may attempt to capture the base all at once or sequentially. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalDeLanglade.description: Destroy at least 4 enemy vehicles while they are attempting to capture the base in one battle.

_x0030_6YearsOfService.name: 06YearsOfService
_x0030_6YearsOfService.condition: Awarded to players for their invaluable contribution to the evolution of World of Tanks.
_x0030_6YearsOfService.description: You have been in the game since %(regDate)s

superTesterVeteran.name: superTesterVeteran
superTesterVeteran.description: For at least 4 years of service as a Supertest participant.

sniper2.name: sniper2
sniper2.condition: • Fire at least 8 shots. • Firing accuracy must be at least 85% per battle. • At least 80% of hits must cause damage, including damage to enemy vehicles and modules. • Damage caused from a distance of more than 300 meters must exceed the hit points of the player's vehicle, at least 1,000 HP. • The player must not hit any allies with direct shots. • Unavailable for SPGs. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
sniper2.description: Cause the highest damage in a battle at a distance of at least 300 meters.

FE18ClosedStage.name: FE18ClosedStage
FE18ClosedStage.description: Play at least one match during one stage of the Silver Cup tournament.

battleCitizen.name: battleCitizen
battleCitizen.condition: • Awarded to all members of the victorious team. • The player must not have destroyed any allies. • Could be obtained in Random Battles only. • Awarded only once for all the battles fought in April, 2014.
battleCitizen.description: Win a battle with the Karl mortar.

heavyFireMedal.name: heavyFireMedal
heavyFireMedal.condition: • Newly received awards are added together. • Only victorious battles are counted. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
heavyFireMedal.description: In 100 battles, be among the top three damage dealers.

moonSphere.name: moonSphere
moonSphere.condition: • Awarded to all members of a victorious team during the special event. • Only one award for all battles fought can be received.
moonSphere.description: Win a battle during the Moon Mayhem special event.

kamikaze.name: kamikaze
kamikaze.condition: • Destroy an enemy vehicle of a higher tier. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
kamikaze.description: Destroy at least one enemy vehicle by ramming it.

_x0030_2YearsOfService.name: 02YearsOfService
_x0030_2YearsOfService.condition: Awarded to players for their invaluable contribution to the evolution of World of Tanks.
_x0030_2YearsOfService.description: You have been in the game since %(regDate)s

shoulderToShoulder.name: shoulderToShoulder
shoulderToShoulder.condition: • Was awarded for causing at least 30,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles. • Damage caused with Combat Reserves was also counted. • Was awarded to all Platoon members in the Rampage mode.
shoulderToShoulder.description: As a Platoon, destroy 12 or more enemy vehicles.

WFC2014.name: WFC2014
WFC2014.condition: • Only the maximum series of victories in a row was counted. • A series was broken by a defeat. • Awarded to all members of a victorious team during the special football event.
WFC2014.description: Win a battle with the T-62A SPORT.

charmed.name: charmed
charmed.condition: • Only hits that caused damage are included. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
charmed.description: Survive and win the battle, having received damage from at least four different enemy vehicles.

readyForBattleSPG.name: readyForBattleSPG
readyForBattleSPG.description: For completion with honors of personal missions for SPGs during the Long-Awaited Backup campaign.

raider.name: raider
raider.condition: • The achievement is awarded upon successful base capture. • Remain within the base circle while attempting to capture the enemy base. • The achievement is awarded even if the vehicle was accidentally hit or damaged. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
raider.description: Remain undetected throughout the entire battle and be the only player who captures the enemy base.

invincible.name: invincible
invincible.condition: • An unbroken series continues in the next battle using the same vehicle. • Every vehicle has its own series. Only the longest series is counted. • Battles fought in SPGs do not count. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
invincible.description: Survive 5 or more battles in a row without taking any damage.

histBattle6_historyLessons.name: histBattle6_historyLessons
histBattle6_historyLessons.name_i18n: Lessons of History: Siege of Tobruk
histBattle6_historyLessons.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
histBattle6_historyLessons.description: Win at least one battle on each of the belligerent sides in any vehicle.

wolfAmongSheepMedal.name: wolfAmongSheepMedal
wolfAmongSheepMedal.condition: • Newly received awards are added together. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
wolfAmongSheepMedal.description: Win 100 battles and be the top player by damage caused.

mechanicEngineer3.name: mechanicEngineer3
mechanicEngineer3.condition: • Unresearched modules do not prevent a player from receiving the award.
mechanicEngineer3.description: Research all vehicles in the China Tech Tree.

guerrillaMedal.name: guerrillaMedal
guerrillaMedal.condition: • Enemy vehicles must be within the vehicle's visibility range. • Newly received awards are added together. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
guerrillaMedal.description: Remain undetected and destroy at least 10 enemy vehicles.

promisingFighterMedal.name: promisingFighterMedal
promisingFighterMedal.condition: • Newly received awards are added together. • Only victorious battles are counted. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
promisingFighterMedal.description: In 100 battles, be among the top three players by experience earned.

medalDumitru.name: medalDumitru
medalDumitru.hero_info: Ion S. Dumitru was a Romanian tank ace. He fought in World War II for just twenty-five days, for five on the German side, and, after Romania changed sides, for twenty days against the Germans. On March 26th, 1945, Dumitru contributed to the destruction of six enemy tank destroyers and capture of a battery of 150-mm howitzers.
medalDumitru.condition: • Drive a tank or a tank destroyer. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalDumitru.description: Destroy 3 enemy SPGs in one battle.

pattonValley.name: pattonValley
pattonValley.condition:
• M46 Patton • M46 Patton KR • M48A5 Patton • M48A2/T54E2/T123E6 • M60
• Series achieved in all vehicles are added together. • Newly received awards are added together. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Ranked Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, and in battles on the Global Map are counted.

FE18OpenFinalStage.name: FE18OpenFinalStage
FE18OpenFinalStage.condition: • Was awarded during the special football event.
FE18OpenFinalStage.description: Reach the final stage of the Gold Cup tournament.

tankExpert8.name: tankExpert8
tankExpert8.description: Destroy all vehicles from the Sweden Tech Tree except Premium and award vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, battles on the Global Map, and the Proving Ground mode (first 10 battles) are counted.

mousebane.name: mousebane
mousebane.condition: • Total results in all vehicles are included. • Newly received awards are added together. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Ranked Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, and in battles on the Global Map are counted.
mousebane.description: Destroy 10 or more Pz.Kpfw. VIII Maus tanks.

histBattle3_battlefield.name: histBattle3_battlefield
histBattle3_battlefield.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
histBattle3_battlefield.description: Win at least one battle on each of the belligerent sides in all vehicles that fought in the actual battle.

medalBrunoPietro.name: medalBrunoPietro
medalBrunoPietro.hero_info: Pietro Bruno was an Italian tank ace. For exceptional valor in the face of the enemy he was awarded the Gold Medal of Military Valor (Medaglia d'oro al Valore Militare), the highest Italian award.
medalBrunoPietro.condition: • Survive and win the battle. • Destroyed enemy vehicles count after all damage is received. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalBrunoPietro.description: Destroy 3-4 enemy vehicles while having 5 different modules damaged or crew members injured and losing 80% of hit points.

readyForBattleAllianceGermany.name: readyForBattleAllianceGermany
readyForBattleAllianceGermany.description: For completion with honors of personal missions for Bloc during the Second Front campaign.

medalOskin.name: medalOskin
medalOskin.hero_info: Alexander Oskin, a Hero of the Soviet Union, was a tank commander who destroyed three King Tigers with his T-34 during a reconnaissance operation near Oglenduv on August 11th, 1944.
medalOskin.condition: • The enemy vehicles must be at least 1 tier higher. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalOskin.description: Destroy at least 3 enemy tanks or tank destroyers with a medium tank in one battle.

newMeritPM2.name: newMeritPM2
newMeritPM2.description: Complete any 5 personal missions of the Second Front campaign.

readyForBattleATSPG.name: readyForBattleATSPG
readyForBattleATSPG.description: For completion with honors of personal missions for tank destroyers during the Long-Awaited Backup campaign.

medalLeClerc.name: medalLeClerc
medalLeClerc.hero_info: Philippe Leclerc was a General of the Free French Forces during WWII and one of the leaders of the Paris liberation operation.
medalLeClerc.condition: • Win the battle. • All enemy base capture points earned in one battle are included.
medalLeClerc.description: For the total number of the player's enemy base capture points.

demolition.name: demolition
demolition.condition: • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
demolition.description: Destroy at least one enemy vehicle by causing its ammunition to explode.

beasthunter.name: beasthunter
beasthunter.condition:
• Pz.Kpfw. V Panther, Panther II, Panther-M10, Panther mit 8,8 cm L/71, Jagdpanther, Jagdpanther II, GW Panther
• Pz.Kpfw. VI Tiger,Pz.Kpfw. VI Tiger (P), Pz.Kpfw. VI Ausf. B Tiger II, Jagdtiger, 8.8 cm Pak43 JagdTiger, GW Tiger, GW Tiger (P), Tiger 131
• Löwe
• Leopard prototyp A, Leopard 1
• Total results in all vehicles are included. • Newly received awards are added together. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Advances, Ranked Battles, Tank Company and in battles on the Global Map are counted.
beasthunter.description: Destroy 100 vehicles of the "feline family," including:

medalTamadaYoshio.name: medalTamadaYoshio
medalTamadaYoshio.hero_info: Colonel Yoshio Tamada was the commander-in-chief of the 4th Armored Regiment of the Kwantung Army. During the night battle of Khalkhyn Gol on July 2–3, 1939, he destroyed 4 batteries of 122-mm howitzers, 107-mm guns, 76.2-mm field guns, 10 armored vehicles, 2 armored tracked vehicles, 7 anti-tank guns, 5 mortars, and 20 enemy trucks.
medalTamadaYoshio.condition: • Survive the battle. • Destroyed enemy vehicles must be one tier higher than the player's tank. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalTamadaYoshio.description: Destroy at least 2 enemy SPGs in a light tank in one battle.

soldierOfFortune.name: soldierOfFortune
soldierOfFortune.description: For the number of victories in Skirmishes.

sentinelMedal.name: sentinelMedal
sentinelMedal.condition: • Only victorious battles are counted. • Newly received awards are added together. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
sentinelMedal.description: Earn at least 1,000 base defense points.

medalCrucialContribution.name: medalCrucialContribution
medalCrucialContribution.condition: • All Platoon members receive the award. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalCrucialContribution.description: Platoon must destroy at least 12 enemy vehicles.

armoredFist.name: armoredFist
armoredFist.condition: • Win the battle. • Awarded to all team members. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
armoredFist.description: Destroy all enemy vehicles while losing only one friendly vehicle.

medalAntiSpgFire.name: medalAntiSpgFire
medalAntiSpgFire.condition: • The player must not destroy any allied vehicles. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalAntiSpgFire.description: In a battle, destroy all enemy SPGs (at least 2) with an SPG.

readyForBattleAllianceFrance.name: readyForBattleAllianceFrance
readyForBattleAllianceFrance.description: For completion with honors of personal missions for Coalition during the Second Front campaign.

operationWinter.name: operationWinter
operationWinter.condition: • Awarded to all members of a victorious team during the winter event. • Only one award for all battles fought could be received. • Could only be obtained in Random Battles.

reliableComrade.name: reliableComrade
reliableComrade.condition: • Hits on modules with no damage caused to them are not included. • Ricochets and non-penetrating hits are not included. • The series is interrupted by any actions that cause damage to allied vehicles. • The series can continue while driving any vehicle. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
reliableComrade.description: Do not cause any damage to allies for 50 battles.

willToWinSpirit.name: willToWinSpirit
willToWinSpirit.condition: • Newly received awards are added together. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
willToWinSpirit.description: Fight alone against at least 3 enemy vehicles and win the battle.

handOfDeath.name: handOfDeath
handOfDeath.condition: • An unbroken series continues in the next battle using the same vehicle. • Every vehicle has its own series. Only the longest series is counted. • This achievement is awarded on completion of the next record series. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
handOfDeath.description: Destroy at least three enemy vehicles in a row. The second and all consecutive vehicles must be destroyed with a single shell each.

falloutDieHard.name: falloutDieHard
falloutDieHard.condition: • Was awarded for causing at least 10,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles. • Was awarded for destroying at least 5 enemy vehicles. • Damage to and destruction of enemy vehicles by Combat Reserves was also counted. • Could only be obtained in a battle of Domination in the Rampage mode.
falloutDieHard.description: Do not lose any of your own vehicles in the battle.

readyForBattleAllianceUSA.name: readyForBattleAllianceUSA
readyForBattleAllianceUSA.description: For completion with honors of personal missions for Alliance during the Second Front campaign.

medalCoolBlood.name: medalCoolBlood
medalCoolBlood.condition: • Drive an SPG of at least Tier IV. • The player must not destroy any allied vehicles. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalCoolBlood.description: Destroy at least 2 enemy light tanks from a distance of not more than 100 meters.

histBattle3_historyLessons.name: histBattle3_historyLessons
histBattle3_historyLessons.name_i18n: Lessons of History: Battle of the Bulge (1944)
histBattle3_historyLessons.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
histBattle3_historyLessons.description: Win at least one battle on each of the belligerent sides in any vehicle.

winnerLaurels.name: winnerLaurels
winnerLaurels.condition: • Could only be obtained in the Rampage mode.
winnerLaurels.description: For the number of victory points earned

honoredRank.name: honoredRank
honoredRank.description: You can receive vehicle rank points after achieving the highest rank in a season.

prematureDetonationMedal.name: prematureDetonationMedal
prematureDetonationMedal.condition: • Newly received awards are added together. • Can only be obtained in Team Battles.
prematureDetonationMedal.description: Destroy 10 enemy vehicles by causing their ammunition to explode.

huntsman.name: huntsman
huntsman.hero_info: Sergeant Grigoriy Naydin was a BT-7 commander. On June 25th, 1941, near the Lithuanian town of Rudishkyay, he destroyed a Wehrmacht armored column that included 15 vehicles and 10 guns of the 19th Mechanized Corps. Naydin managed to hold off the German advance for two days, making it possible to organize the defenses around Vilnius. For this action, Naydin was made a Hero of the Soviet Union.
huntsman.condition: • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
huntsman.description: Destroy all enemy light tanks (at least 3) in the course of one battle.

generalOfTheArmy.name: generalOfTheArmy
generalOfTheArmy.condition: • Must also have reached rank: General. • Can be obtained in Frontline only.
generalOfTheArmy.description: Be the player with the highest XP at the end of the battle.

FE18SoloDefender.name: FE18SoloDefender
FE18SoloDefender.description: Rank any position in the rating table of defenders during one stage of the football event.

medalBurda.name: medalBurda
medalBurda.hero_info: Guards Colonel Alexander Burda was a Soviet tank ace and a Hero of the Soviet Union. On October 4th, 1941, Burda organized an ambush that destroyed an enemy armored column, including ten medium and light tanks, two trucks with antitank guns, and five infantry vehicles.
medalBurda.condition: • Drive a tank or a tank destroyer. • The destroyed vehicle must be at least 1 tier higher. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalBurda.description: Destroy 3 enemy SPGs in one battle.

HE17A1.name: HE17A1
HE17A1.description: You were victorious over Leviathan in 25 battles during Leviathan's Invasion.

FE18Universal.name: FE18Universal
FE18Universal.condition: • The conditions can be met in three matches in a random order. • Was awarded during the special football event.
FE18Universal.description: Win three matches while playing each of three roles: a striker, a midfielder and a defender.

falloutAlwaysInLine.name: falloutAlwaysInLine
falloutAlwaysInLine.condition: • Was awarded to all players who won at least one battle during the Rampage special event. • The award could only be received once during the event.
falloutAlwaysInLine.description: Win a battle during the Rampage special event.

makerOfHistory.name: makerOfHistory
makerOfHistory.condition: • Can be obtained in Historical Battles only.
makerOfHistory.description: For the number of victories that were won on each of the belligerent sides.

stormLord.name: stormLord
stormLord.condition: • Could only be obtained in the Rampage mode.
stormLord.description: For the number of enemy vehicles destroyed by Combat Reserves

xmasTreeBronze.name: xmasTreeBronze
xmasTreeBronze.condition: • You can enhance the Festive Atmosphere by putting more decorations on your New Year Tree and Snowitzer. • Awarded to all players, who fulfill all required conditions during the 2016–2017 New Year special.
xmasTreeBronze.description: Reach Festive Atmosphere Level II by participating in the New Year special.

bombardier.name: bombardier
bombardier.condition: • Series achieved in all vehicles are added together. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
bombardier.description: Destroy at least 2 enemy vehicles with one shell.

medalNikolas.name: medalNikolas
medalNikolas.hero_info: Alfie Nicols was a British tank gunner. During the battle of Al Alamein he destroyed fourteen enemy vehicles.
medalNikolas.condition: • The enemy vehicles must be at least 1 tier higher. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
medalNikolas.description: Destroy at least 4 enemy tanks or tank destroyers with a medium tank in one battle.

tankExpert1.name: tankExpert1
tankExpert1.description: Destroy all vehicles from the Germany Tech Tree except Premium and award vehicles. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, battles on the Global Map, and the Proving Ground mode (first 10 battles) are counted.

battleTested.name: battleTested
battleTested.condition: • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
battleTested.description: For the number of awards received in Team Battles.

fighter.name: fighter
fighter.condition: • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
fighter.description: Destroy four or five enemy vehicles in one battle.

markIBomberman.name: markIBomberman
markIBomberman.description: Blow a track off the Mk. I using a bomb.

sturdy.name: sturdy
sturdy.condition: • Survive the battle. • Hits to external modules are not counted. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
sturdy.description: Survive a ricochet or non-penetrating hit from an enemy team player. Your vehicle must have less than 10% of its hit points left.

streamersEventJove.name: streamersEventJove
streamersEventJove.condition: • Выдаётся игрокам, выполнившим необходимое условие в рамках события «Битва блогеров».
streamersEventJove.description: Вступить в команду блогера Jove и заработать 5 очков для его команды.

streamersEventUsha.name: streamersEventUsha
streamersEventUsha.condition: • Выдаётся игрокам, выполнившим необходимое условие в рамках события «Битва блогеров».
streamersEventUsha.description: Вступить в команду блогера Yusha и заработать 5 очков для его команды.

HE17A2.name: HE17A2
HE17A2.condition: Banish Leviathan 10 times without getting destroyed.
HE17A2.description: You banished Leviathan 10 times without getting destroyed during Leviathan's Invasion.

_x0030_7YearsOfService.name: 07YearsOfService
_x0030_7YearsOfService.condition: Awarded to players for their invaluable contribution to the evolution of World of Tanks.
_x0030_7YearsOfService.description: You have been in the game since %(regDate)s

scout.name: scout
scout.condition: • Win the battle. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

FE18SoloMidfielder.name: FE18SoloMidfielder
FE18SoloMidfielder.description: Rank any position in the rating table of midfielders during one stage of the football event.

bruteForceMedal.name: bruteForceMedal
bruteForceMedal.condition: • Newly received awards are added together. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.

alphaTester.name: alphaTester
alphaTester.name_i18n: For participation in the Alpha test
alphaTester.condition: Awarded to players for their invaluable contribution to the evolution of World of Tanks.

tacticalBreakthrough.name: tacticalBreakthrough
tacticalBreakthrough.condition: • Every vehicle has its own series. An unbroken series continues in the next battle using the same vehicle. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
tacticalBreakthrough.description: Win at least 3 battles in a row as a member of a random team.

xmasTreeSilver.name: xmasTreeSilver
xmasTreeSilver.condition: • You can enhance the Festive Atmosphere by putting more decorations on your New Year Tree and Snowitzer. • Awarded to all players, who fulfill all required conditions during the 2016–2017 New Year special.
xmasTreeSilver.description: Reach Festive Atmosphere Level V by participating in the New Year special.

_x0030_4YearsOfService.name: 04YearsOfService
_x0030_4YearsOfService.condition: Awarded to players for their invaluable contribution to the evolution of World of Tanks.
_x0030_4YearsOfService.description: You have been in the game since %(regDate)s

fallout.name: fallout
fallout.condition: • Was awarded to all members of a victorious team during the special event. • Only one award for all battles fought could be received.

_x0030_8YearsOfService.name: 08YearsOfService
_x0030_8YearsOfService.condition: Awarded to players for their invaluable contribution to the evolution of World of Tanks.
_x0030_8YearsOfService.description: You have been in the game since %(regDate)s
